name: Get A Move On!!
description:
HOW TO PLAY: Click the screen to propel the character in the opposite direction. The farther away you from the character you click the more force the push will have. Remember to take it slow!

EDIT: The buttons being gone now is *hopefully* fixed so it's playable now haha

KNOWN BUGS: The game doesn't seem to work in Chrome? At least for me. I don't know why. Works in other broswers though!

FEEDBACK QUESTIONS: Is the game too hard? Are the push mechanics more annoying than challenging? Or is it totally fine and it's actually too easy? What is the truth?

THINGS I PLAN TO ADD:

  • Sound
  • Custom buttons
  • More levels
  • Some power ups
